Class WebApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.Application
      • edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.WebApplication

  • public class WebApplication
extends Application
    Restlet Application implementation. Creates endpoint routes and connects them to Resources.
